titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Whereas the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, vpon information heretofore geuen vnto the same, of the great and excessiue pryces that wines transported hither out of Fraunce ...
Proclamations. 1576-07-27
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iugge [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill], printer to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Actual printers' names and publication date from STC.
Requiring observance of price ceilings for French wines.
Identified as STC 8078 on UMI microfilm reel 456.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
